nodes.text: The Kintan Arena was a gladiatorial arena located in the Nikto Sector of the moon Nar Shaddaa during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. The Kintan Kings and their leader, the Mountain, used the arena as their base.
The Kintan Arena appears in the Republic mission "Strike the Mountain Asunder" on Nar Shaddaa in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
